creditline: Gift of Deborah Kuschner and The Walter R. Bollinger Fund
description: 10 photos mounted in 2 horizontal rows forming a sequence in time with woman standing at L, smoking man seated on stoop at center and woman at R on a chair, smoking and drinking from a bottle; cat moves from L to R throughout sequence
marks: \'88\' and sequence number, in pencil, on back of ea \'Helen Levitt\', in pencil, on back of each print
title: Untitled
